trends: There have been no other sightings in N.Hlwd
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: bright light resembling sattelite no other lights, orb like moving at fast rate of speed
divs: Sighting Detailslooking NW i saw what appeared to be a star or sattelite but was to low to be either, i called out to my wife and she came to observe from inside our home. it continued in a straight line to the SE at high rate of speed, just a bright light with no other lights. it looked and moved like nothing ive seen before, the speed was too fast. lost visual behind trees as it appeared to be headed to the san diego area.
